fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Any policy areas discussed at  the European Council
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: Our own discussion groups are networks; The European Strategy Forum and the Dialogue Group.
goals__remit: Writing about every meeting of the European Council, about important EU policies and politics and leading discussion groups on all these subjects with the aim of making them more transparent and understandable to civil society.
relevant_communication:
Publications: pre-summit briefings and evaluations of the Conclusions from each meeting of the European Council 
 
Oral briefings on the Conclusions within 5 days of each European Council 
 
2 day meetings of the European Strategy Forum (4 times pa) 
 
half day meetings of the Dialogue Group 
 
new series of briefings in London on  the Brexit negotiations
